attributes.action:
Petition
Support the British Theatre industry during the COVID-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Those of us who are trained, Actors, technical staff, front of house, box office, restaurants & bars all rely on the Theatre being able to function in order to earn a living. We cannot let a Billion pound industry fail
attributes.background: The Government needs to provide a support package to the industry until it is able to get back up and running as currently reserves will run out by December
